title: KM Watch faces and Widgets

descriptionHTML:
KM Clock, Battery widgets and clock watch face for Android Wear

Free widgets for Android devices:
★ Analog clock widget / Analog watch face for Android wea rdevices;

* More Analog watch faces in app "KM Watch faces / Clock Widgets" https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mikhaylov.kolesov.clockwidgets

★ Digital clock widget;
★ Battery widget (battery charge) (four colors for the battery);
★ Switch widget.

Features of the analog clock widget:
★ Hands and faces of analog clocks were created entirely from clay;
★ Customizable analog clock: have it with or without the second hand.

Features of the digital clock widget:
★ Customizable frame color;
★ Customizable digits on display.

Features of the switches widget:
★ Airplane Mode;
★ Bluetooth;
★ Sync;
★ Wi-Fi;
★ GPS;
★ Sound.

Especially for fans of Plasticine Live wallpapers;

Now you can have widgets for turn on/off the: bluetooth, GPS, Sound, Airplane mode by using The KM Switch widget.
Now you can have widgets for monitoring state of the battery by using the KM Battery widget.
Now you can have clock - just use KM Clock widget.

Like this app on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/plasticinewidgets
Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/103662583408699727448/posts

comments: Love it These faces remind me of when I was a kid and watched California raisins or Saturday morning cartoons. Claymation ❤❤❤
At last. A funky watch face sure to make you smile

Don't waste time or money. Second hand is useless it doesn't work. You have to pay for this because you don't get any good clock faces with the free version. Then the clock faces don't update. Such a cute idea but they have implemented it clumsily without much thought to how it actually works. (4/26/16) No, you didn't fix it, still doesn't work.

Very nice but far from perfect A lovely app with some lovely watch faces and widgets, BUT the second hand on the widgets is atrocious and the watch faces don't have a low power mode - it doesn't even dim never mind go 8bit
No content This doesn't actually install a usable app. It's a shame because the watch faces look cute.
